    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:D315_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>D315_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">The technology of crime control</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Technologie der Verbrechensteuerung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La technologie de la commande de crime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tecnologia do controle do crime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La tecnologia di controllo di crimine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τεχνολογία του ελέγχου εγκλήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La tecnología del control del crimen</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">How big an impact does CCTV have on your life? This unit provides the opportunity to listen to an argument surrounding the purpose, efficacy and regulation of CCTV. Is it there for crime control or is Big Brother really watching?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Audio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Big_brother</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">CCTV</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">CCTV_cameras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Closed_circuit_television</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Crime_control</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Surveillence</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie groß eine Auswirkung hat CCTV auf Ihrer 
Lebensdauer? Diese Maßeinheit liefert die Gelegenheit, zu einem
Argument zu hören, das den Zweck, die Wirksamkeit und die Regelung 
von CCTV umgibt. Ist sie dort zur Verbrechensteuerung, oder 
überwacht grosser Bruder wirklich?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment grand un impact CCTV a-t-il votre vie ? 
Cette unité fournit l'occasion d'écouter un argument entourant
le but, l'efficacité et le règlement de CCTV. Est-elle là 
pour la commande de crime ou le frère observe-t-il vraiment ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como grande um impacto CCTV tem em sua vida? 
Esta unidade fornece a oportunidade de escutar um argumento que 
cerca a finalidade, o efficacy e o regulamento de CCTV. É lá 
para o controle do crime ou o irmão grande está prestando atenção 
realmente?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quanto grande un effetto CCTV ha sulla vostra 
vita? Questa unità fornisce l'occasione ascoltare un argomento 
che circonda lo scopo, l'efficacia e la regolazione di CCTV. È 
là per controllo di crimine o il fratello maggiore realmente sta 
guardando?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόσο μεγάλο ένας αντίκτυπος το CCTV έχει στη ζωή 
σας; Αυτή η μονάδα παρέχει την ευκαιρία να ακούσει ένα 
όρισμα που περιβάλλει το σκοπό, την αποτελεσματικότητα και τον 
κανονισμό του CCTV. Είναι εκεί για τον έλεγχο εγκλήματος
ή μεγάλος αδελφός προσέχει πραγματικά;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo grande un impacto CCTV tiene en su vida? 
Esta unidad proporciona a la oportunidad de escuchar un 
argumento que rodea el propósito, la eficacia y la regulación de 
CCTV. ¿Está allí para el control del crimen o el hermano mayor
realmente está mirando?</string>
          </description>
